page.title: 14Keymer Fire Station
page.content: There has been a fire station in Keymer for over 80 years. The present one, based in Dale Avenue, is having its{50th}anniversary this year. The present crew of Keymer Fire Station is:- Station Officer: George Dunne Peter Twine Michael Alford Erny Wadey Tony Bryant Alan Burford. One family has been responsible for Keymer Fire Station until quite recently. That family was the{Craggs. In every photograph which is at the fire station you will find one of several{Craggs}. The fire engine was based behind the{Infant School,}when it was horse drawn. In 1936 they got their first motorised engine.
